item.title: [PI] Skillcape level requirments
item.dc:creator: @Dragonxile Dragonxile
item.description:
@Dragonxile wrote:

OK, So my skillcape store is glitchy due to the fact of the summoning skill on my server >< so i was wondering, how do i add a level requirment to my skillcapes? I went into itemassistant and try to do the

if (itemName.contains("prayer cape (t)")) { c.prayerLevelReq = 99; }

but it didnt work?

It doesnt work for any skills besides, magic, range, attack, strength and defence :S

Could someone please help!!?!

Read full topic
